sentence.Network_en: Pleiades are approximately 440 light - years away and the Hyades are about one - third that distance: 150 light - years .
sentence.Network_cn: 昴星团(离地球)大约有440 光年 远,而毕星团则大约是此距离的 三分之一: 150 光年.

sentence.Network_en: Most of the V is formed by an open cluster of stars, called the Hyades.
